name: skill-gap-analyzer
description: Privacy-first Chrome extension for skill gap analysis

scripts.package: npm run build && npm run package:prepare && npm run package:zip
scripts.package:prepare: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path 'extension-package') { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force 'extension-package' }; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'extension-package'; Copy-Item 'dist/background.js' 'extension-package/'; Copy-Item 'dist/content.js' 'extension-package/'; Copy-Item 'dist/popup.js' 'extension-package/'; Copy-Item 'manifest.json' 'extension-package/'; Copy-Item 'popup.html' 'extension-package/'; if (Test-Path 'src/styles') { Copy-Item -Recurse 'src/styles' 'extension-package/' }"
